name: Senpai Teaches Me Japanese Part 1
detailed_description:
Adoring teachers cheer you on as they teach you from knowing nothing to having basic understanding of the Japanese language. In the form of a visual novel, you are taught all characters, and many words including those relating but not limited to:

• Food
• Places
• Numbers
• Tangible items
• Characteristics
• and general speech terms


Featuring:

• A relaxing 11 song OST
• Choice of 5 cute teachers
• Professional anime voice acting (Not full)
• Lessons for learning ALL hiragana characters
• 50+ words in Japanese and how to pronounce them


"We're excited to begin teaching you, come learn with us!"

"Ah.. Y-yes... see you soon?"

(´・ω・`)

short_description: Have you ever wanted to learn Japanese ? This visual novel boasts quick and easy learning in a fun environment, making this is a great place to start !

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Practically anything
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: not required
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game is highly easy to run
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel-i9900k or better
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 3090 Ti+
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: This game is extremely difficult to run

content_descriptors.notes:
- Lewd jokes and dialogue
- Characters can appear to be inappropriately dressed
- This game not recommended to be played at work
